snippet: Republicans are trying to turn President Obama’s health care law into an election weapon and are preparing to exploit every problem and complaint that arises as it is carried out.
abstract: Republicans are trying to turn Pres Obama's health care law into election weapon in 2014 midterms, preparing to exploit every problem and complaint that arises as it is carried out; as administration struggles to put in place the final, complex piece of signature legislation, Democrats are worried that major snags will cause political nightmare.
lead_paragraph: Republicans are trying to turn President Obama’s health care law into an election weapon and are preparing to exploit every problem and complaint that arises as it is carried out.

headline.seo: Republicans Readying New Offensive Over Health Law
headline.main: As Midterms Loom, Democrats Worry About Health Law
headline.print_headline: New Worries For Democrats On Health Law

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject
